Field.name: SalesReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Letter or account number referring to a sales document

Field.name: SalesReferenceDate
Field.comment: Date of letter or account number source expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TransportationTermsCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the trade terms which apply to the shipment transportation responsibility

Field.name: SalesComment
Field.comment: Free-form text used to clarify sales/delivery terms

Field.name: DeliveryDate
Field.comment: Date for delivery of cargo to final consignee or to next mode expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either M207 or M208 is present, then the other is required.
